tags: None
review:
Dr Pooja is a very caring and approachable doctor. I visited the doctor in the month of February 2021 to discuss the laparoscopic hysterectomy procedures and her explanations about the entire process were very detailed and informative. All my doubts were addressed multiple times and it gave me the confidence to go ahead with the surgery. 

The surgery was also done with the utmost care, safety and perfection. The doctor is very reliable, passionate and dedicated. It's rare to find doctors today, who will follow up with the patient's well-being on a timely basis. I totally recommend Dr Pooja to whoever is reading this.
